body_html:
In addition to rotations I'm also interested in applying generalized affine and projective transformations to images.

Stackoverflow also has another implementation of rotation as a tensorflow graph written using existing ops in python.
body_text:
In addition to rotations I'm also interested in applying generalized affine and projective transformations to images.
Stackoverflow also has another implementation of rotation as a tensorflow graph written using existing ops in python.
body:
In addition to rotations I'm also interested in applying generalized affine and projective transformations to images.

Stackoverflow also has [another implementation of rotation as a tensorflow graph written using existing ops in python](http://stackoverflow.com/a/40483687/99379).
